content: SIW 2-A12 Cordless impact wrench Subcompact-class cordless impact wrench with 3/8” friction ring anvil for economical anchoring and bolting, especially in cramped spaces ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Impact drivers and wrenches- - - ### FEATURES:Features 3/8 square drive with friction ring retention – for safety and quicker socket changes Powerful brushless motor and impact mechanism – delivers up to 2,700 rpm and 180 Nm of rated torque, but requires virtually no maintenance Improved tool handling – the latest Hilti grip design and 2 bright LED lights help you work in comfort, even in hard-to-reach spaces Unbeatable cordless performance – the combination of efficient brushless motor and the latest Hilti 12V batteries deliver our most work-per-change yet for an impact wrench Hilti’s ultimate cordless impact wrench for working overhead or in cramped spaces – at just 5-3/8” long and weighing under 1.7 lbs, this subcompact 12V impact wrench is our recommendation for jobs where accessibility matters most Applications Driving screw anchors in concrete and masonry Driving lag bolts Tightening and releasing nuts and bolts Bolting equipment, automotive parts, wood frames, piping and HVAC installations ### TECHNICAL DATA: Anvil type: 3/8 friction ring Maximum torque: 133 ft-lbs (1) Full hammering frequency: 3.988 impacts/minute Technical Data | Anvil type | 3/8 friction ring | Maximum torque | 133 ft-lbs (1) | 1 | Full hammering frequency | 3.988 impacts/minute | No load RPM | gear 1: 2.75 rpm | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 5.4 x 2.7 x 7 in | Tool body weight | 1.7 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 92 dB (A) | 2 | Do not use the tool for applications where an exact torque or maximum torque is specified - there is a risk of over-tightening and damaging the screw or workpiece. | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3891253 - SIW 2-A Kit - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SIW 2-A12 Cordl. imp. wrench - 1x C 4/12-50 110V Battery charger - 1x Belt hook for SF/SI cordless tools - 2x B 12-55 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x S Soft Pouch - 2381342 - Cordl. Impact wrench SIW 2A12 3/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x SIW 2-A12 Cordl. imp. wrench
